metadata.title: CVE-2016-7545 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
SELinux policycoreutils allows local users to execute arbitrary commandsoutside of the sandbox via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7545` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

newrole - 2.6-1
policycoreutils - 2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: policycoreutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-1').
